title: Pickled garlic and jalapeno peppers
ingredients: ['600ml white vinegar', '120ml olive oil', '2 carrots, sliced into bite-sized pieces', '16 fresh jalapeno chilli peppers, sliced', '1 head garlic, peeled, or more to taste', '2 tablespoons whole black peppercorns', '2 tablespoons ground coriander', '2 tablespoons coarse sea salt, or to taste', '2 tablespoons whole mustard seeds', '2 teaspoons thyme leaves']
